item.title: Harmonica Note Converter
item.description: Harmonica Note Converter aims to create a python library to convert notes or tabs for different kind of harmonicas. It is based on musthe. https://github.com/mozanunal/harmonica-note-converter Story Some of you know that I am an ameteur harmonica player and I love harmonicas. I usually play diatonic harmonicas but last time I have bought a chromatic harmonica, which has quite different tone and it is hard to find music notes for it.
